github_commits.author: Rahul Sharma
github_commits.lessons_learned: Need to properly document the audit log policy - seems like it's impacting our approach.

github_commits.author: Priya Sharma
github_commits.message: Added unit tests for Core features
github_commits.lessons_learned: Testing is crucial, but let's ensure the audit log requirements aren't unnecessarily restrictive.
github_commits.bug_related: The audit log policy is causing friction in the testing process.

slack_conversations.thread_title: Discussion about Core features - Yaar, Core features pe kaam karna hai

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Yaar, Core features pe kaam karna hai.  Speed hai!

messages.author: Priya
messages.text: Haan bhai, main dekh rahi hoon.  Progress karna hai.

messages.author: Amit
messages.text: Theek hai, let me check the code and see if this audit log thing is causing too much trouble.

messages.author: Neha
messages.text: Arrey, ye issue production mein aayega kya?  If we don't handle it properly?

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Nahi yaar, testing mein catch kar lenge.  Let's not over-engineer it for the initial release.

messages.author: Amit
messages.text: I'm seeing a potential conflict with the audit log policy.  Need to discuss with legal.

slack_conversations.key_decisions: Decided to proceed with Core features, but with caution regarding the audit log policy.
slack_conversations.warnings: Warning: The audit log policy seems to be creating unnecessary complexity. Need to investigate.
slack_conversations.bug_clues: Neha's concern about production impact highlights a potential problem with the audit log policy.
slack_conversations.bug_stage: Policy covers audit logs by mistake

jira_tickets.title: Implement Core features - Initial Version
jira_tickets.description: Develop the initial version of the Core features, focusing on functionality.  Must adhere to the audit log policy.
comments: Arjun: Started working on the Core features.  Need clarification on the audit log requirements.
Rahul: Let me know if you have any questions about the policy.
jira_tickets.bug_connection: The audit log policy is a key factor in the development effort and potential roadblocks.
jira_tickets.bug_stage: Policy covers audit logs by mistake

confluence_docs.title: Documentation for Core features - Sprint 2

confluence_docs.author: Sneha Patel

google_docs.title: Sprint 2 Planning Meeting - Core features
google_docs.content: Meeting notes from the Sprint 2 planning session.  Discussed the Core features roadmap and potential challenges, especially concerning the audit log policy.
action_items: Rahul to schedule a meeting with legal to discuss the audit log policy.
Arjun to start working on the initial implementation.
decisions_made: Decided to prioritize the Core features but with a focus on minimizing the impact of the audit log policy.
Allocated 8 sprint points for the initial implementation.
